experiment_name: Synthesis of β-Branched Tryptophan Analogues Using an Engineered Subunit of Tryptophan Synthase
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:75 °C;    reaction_ph:8.0;    reaction_other_conditions:10 µM enzyme (heat-treated lysate), 5% (v/v) DMSO, 1 h reaction time, anaerobic (98/2% N2/H2 atmosphere), borosilicate glass vials;    reaction_substrate_concentration:20 mM Indole, 20 mM L-threonine
